item.title: By: Ian Landsman's Weblog

item.description: <strong>Data Normalization</strong> "Im always amazed at the number of people doing database work who dont know anything about data normalization." - Joseph Scott. Nice little page about DB normilization via Joseph Scott.
item.content:encoded:
Data Normalization
“Im always amazed at the number of people doing database work who dont know anything about data normalization.” – Joseph Scott. Nice little page about DB normilization via Joseph Scott.
